audioText: Sa connaissance approfondie de la philosophie lui permet de participer à des débats intellectuels stimulants.
question: What enables him to participate in stimulating intellectual debates?
explanation: The text states 'Sa connaissance approfondie de la philosophie lui permet de participer à des débats intellectuels stimulants' - His deep knowledge of philosophy enables him to participate in stimulating intellectual debates. 'Connaissance' means knowledge/understanding.
